alert.note: Alert for Brown (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 10:00PM CDT until September 11 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN BROWN COUNTY... At 958 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cross Cut, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... May around 1010 PM CDT. Byrds around 1015 PM CDT. Grosvenor around 1020 PM CDT. Lake Brownwood, Lake Brownwood State Park and Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Owens and Thrifty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
